name: Assigned Estate of Joseph S. Wright and Jacob A. Schmid, trading as Wright and Schmid. Appeal of Converse, Stanton & Cullen

judges: Before Green, Williams, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: Assigned Estate of Joseph S. Wright and Jacob A. Schmid, trading as Wright and Schmid. Appeal of Converse, Stanton & Cullen.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Williams,
This case is identical in character with that of the appeal of Fred. Tietor in which an opinion has just been filed, ante, p. 90.
The decree is reversed for the reasons there given.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Williams,

casebody.head_matter:
Assigned Estate of Joseph S. Wright and Jacob A. Schmid, trading as Wright and Schmid. Appeal of Converse, Stanton & Cullen.
Argued March 25, 1897.
Appeal, No. 24, Jan. T., 1897, by Converse, Stanton & Cullen, from order of C. P. No. 1, Phila. Co., June T., 1891, No. 863, dismissing exceptions to auditor’s report.
Before Green, Williams, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Reversed.
July 15,1897:
